sentences.sContent: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.sCn: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

sentences.sContent: ...The company spent the last five years developing solar panels that are only about a quarter of inch thick and are strong enough to stand up to heavy highway traffic without breaking or making the roads more slippery...
...referring to an insufficiently inquiring attitude on the part of an the George Washington bridge traffic scandal...
...an employee at Danny's Cycles in Gramercy also said Citi Bike is a good option for people to ease into biking in a city famed for its traffic jams and aggressive drivers...
...without regard to/with no regard for/completely ignoring the traffic lights...
...But she does have to drive through very heavy traffic to get here...
...Jane maybe caught in a traffic jam...
...but there is a lot of traffic everywhere today because of the football game...
...there is very little traffic in the opposite direction...

synos.tran: [交]交通；运输；贸易；[通信]通信量

phrases.pCn: 空中交通，航空运输；飞航
交通状况，运输情况；有效状况
客运，旅客流量；旅客运输

trans.tranOther: the vehicles moving along a road or street
